args:
O power universal of the Qilin,
be bound by my solemn decree.
Immutable plate, let thy heat accumulate!
Strong and swift may you invoke your gift!
Now all ya gotta do's leave your food on\ntop of this plate, and it'll stay pipin' hot\nfor as long as you want!
These Qilin relics certainly do seem useful.\nI suppose there's no inherent danger in\none with so straightforward a function.
Yup. The one I used to try and fix the wall\ncan just be a bit tricky to handle, that's all.
Wheeee hee hee! So THAT is how brick\nwas rendered back to clay!

An absolutely fascinating phenomenon,
these relics of yours! Truly a marvel!
Might I make an inquiry or two as
to their nature and function?
What theâ€”this guy's, like, the definition\nof shady!
...But shady or not, if you're interested in\nQilin relics, then I'm all too happy to\nanswer! Ask away.
Many thanks! Now, are there any Qilin\nrelics that can make an object disappear\nfrom view?
Hmmm... Well, I've got one that does\nsomething kiiind of like that...
Thank you, Jiang Ziya, but you've said\nquite enough.
What?! Why did you stop her?!
I can see right through you. You're trying to\nmake yourself invisible so you can get\nclose to Midgardsormr, aren't you?
Wheeee hee hee! Guilty as charged!
The completion of my research calls for\na dragon scale, you see.
You are incorrigible. Have you forgotten\nthe terrible dangers you faced already?
Please, Jiang Ziya, refrain from granting\nKleimann access to any of your relics.
Aye-aye, Cleo! I read you loud and clear!
Wheee hee! So, you've been issued a\nwarning! Ah, but what is a warning but\nan invitation dressed in reproach?
Jeez, you must REALLY want that scale.
Oh, I do indeed. But I also have interest\nin your relics beyond that specific\napplication.
They make the impossible possible! How\ncould a researcher like myself resist the\npedagogic allure of such arcane objects?!
Man, you're relentless. But they really get\nyou goin', huh?
But of course! To a researcher, they are\nfascinating without compare!
I am truly grateful that you came to our\ncastle, Jiang Ziya.
Hee hee! I AM a genius, aren't I?\nI'm gonna be soaked head to toe in a\nshower of compliments at this rate!
You're definitely shady, but you're not so\nbad. ...Ah, what the heck. I'll let ya use\nmy relics!
Egads! Tell me, what is the nature of\nthis relic?
It'll snuff out any trace of your presence\nand make everyone ignore you.
It technically won't make you disappear,\nbut... Well, I guess the result's the same!
Fascinating... Let us hurry and try it out!
So, I put this ring on, and...hm?
Ah, yes! It seems the relic is in effect.\nNo one will notice me now!
And as such, I shall secure myself a\ndragon scale without protest!
Hmm...? What is this? It's faint, but\nI sense something nearby...
Huh?! You! Still you hound me for my\nscales?! Do you never learn?!
Bwah! How did you notice me...?!
Begone, you rogue! Out with you!
Hmm, that's curious. Maybe the ring's\neffect doesn't work on dragons?
Ah, but it did, if only slightly. He seemed\nto notice me only after looking veeery\ncarefully.
We should modify the relic to magnify\nits power!
No way! Modifying Qilin relics is a\nhuge taboo!
And yet are taboos not made to be\nbroken? Wheeee hee hee ha ha hoo!
The reticence of others often leads to the\nmost exciting scientific breakthroughs!
And there is nothing quite so thrilling to a\nresearcher as challenging the unknown.
I...suppose that's another way of\nlooking at it.
You might be shady, but you've got a\npretty unique view of the world.
All right! Let's modify this sucker\nand see what it can do!
Wheeee hee hee! Now you're talking!\nThings have taken a turn for the\nFASCINATING!
Now, my hypothesis is that this pattern on\nthe ring controls mana.
Oooh, I see! So what if we tried to change\nit like this?
Seems okay so far. The dragon hasn't\nnoticed us yet.
Indeed. Now, let us begin the experiment!\nJiang Ziya, activate the modified relic!

On it! O power universal of the Qilin,
be bound by my solemn decree.
Ring of limpidity! Contract of realization!
Boundless, unerring indifference!
What is this wicked presence?!\nWho's there?! Show yourself!
Wheeee hee hee heeeee!\nWhat an unexpected result!
How are you laughing right noâ€”\nHey, hold on.
When I look at you, I feel kind of...\nAnnoyed.
Interesting... It would seem the result of\nour tinkering is a change in the ring's\neffect altogether.
The relic which makes everyone ignore\nyou...now makes them HATE you!
What?! Oh, nooo! So we failed?
What?! This is a rousing success! We were\nable to change the effect of a Qilin relic\nthrough modification!
I see. Then the ferocious disgust I feel\nis the doing of this so-called relic.
...That being the case, I will blow you\nAND this fiendish relic away together!\nMy patience has reached its limit!
Er, we appear to have miscalculated.\nJiang Ziya, stop the relic! Quickly!
Shut your face! I don't wanna hear it!
And come to think of it, your mask is\nstupid as all get out!
I had thought us kindred spirits, and yet\nnow she loathes me so...
The effect of this Qilin relic truly is...\nDeplorable! Whee hee hee ha ha hooo!
You rogue! Philistine! Untutored boor!\nI unleash my most furious tempest\nupon you! TAKE THIS!
Uwaaaaah! Why me?! I've got nothing\nto do with this!
So this is a dragon's true power...\nWhat an utterly invaluable experience!\nWheeee hee hee heeeee!
Peace and quiet at last.\nGoodness, what a bothersome pair.
And yet, when I think upon the fact that\nthere exists an object capable of\ninfluencing a dragon's mind so...
Hm. Those Qilin relics hold truly awesome\npower... For better or worse.
